short.am,ar,bn,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,: Audit potential privacy leaks on websites
short.bg: Одитирайте потенциални течове на поверителност на уебсайтове
short.cs: Auditujte možné úniky soukromí na webových stránkách
short.da: Revidere potentielle lækager fra personlige oplysninger på websteder
short.de: Prüfen Sie mögliche Datenschutzlecks auf Websites
short.el: Ελέγξτε τις πιθανές διαρροές απορρήτου στους ιστότοπους
short.es: Audite posibles fugas de privacidad en sitios web
short.fr: Vérifiez les fuites potentielles de confidentialité sur les sites Web
short.hr: Revizirajte moguće propuste privatnosti na web stranicama
short.hu: Ellenőrizze a webhelyek lehetséges adatvédelmi szivárgásait
short.it: Controlla potenziali perdite di privacy sui siti Web
short.pl: Kontroluj potencjalne wycieki prywatności na stronach internetowych
short.ro: Verificați eventualele scurgeri de confidențialitate pe site-urile web
short.sk: Auditujte potenciálne úniky súkromia na webových stránkach
short.sl: Revizirajte morebitne uhajanja zasebnosti na spletnih mestih

long.am,ar,bn,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,:
The extension helps you control potential privacy leaks by auditing external content on every website you visit.

In the pop-up you see all outgoing connections to external resources. You may block some or all of them and prevent leakage of any data in the future. Next time when you visit the website, these blocks will be applied automatically.

Blocked websites are shared with other users to help make the Web great again in terms of GDPR and privacy.

The extension is free of charge and open-source, distributed under public MIT license on https://github.com/noleakseu/extension
long.bg,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fi,fr,hr,hu,it,lt,l:
The extension helps you control potential privacy leaks by auditing external content on every website you visit.

In the pop-up you see all outgoing connections to the external resources. You may block some or all of them and prevent the leaks of any data in the future. Next time when you visit the website, these blocks will be applied automatically.

Blocked websites are shared with other users to help make the Web great again in terms of GDPR and privacy.
